title: This Week's Top Stories - Tragedy on Set, "Facebook Papers" Revelations & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Tragedy on Set, "Facebook Papers" Revelations & More
description:
Alec Baldwin accidentally shoots a cinematographer to death, Facebook is under fire for rewarding harmful content, and a man lives in an airport for three months.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
